Player History
Drafted in 4th round, 37th overall pick, by Washington in 2019...
Had first career hit on 4/1/2019, off Jacob Raymond (HOU)...
Hit first career homerun on 4/2/2019, off Manuel Luna (HOU)...
Was selected to the 2019 Allstar game...
Won Gold Glove at Second Base in 2019...
Won Batter of the Month award on 6/1/2020, hitting .361 with 9 HR, 27 RBI...
Was selected to the 2020 Allstar game...
Won Player of the Week award on 9/18/2020, hitting .440 with 3 HR, 7 RBI...
Won Gold Glove at Second Base in 2020...
Signed as a free agent by Oakland on 2/1/2021 to a 5-year deal worth $9,232,000 per year...
Was selected to the 2021 Allstar game...
